DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore compare perception satisfaction two different delivery mechanism Etanercept ( Etanercept Autoinjector Etanercept Prefilled Syringe ) patient rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Perceptions Satisfaction Two Different Delivery Mechanisms Etanercept
DOC.detailed_description: This study describe patient perception related device attribute , importance describe overall patient perception . A range potential device benefit ( e.g . ease use , convenience , confidence , presence absence fear , side effect related administration ) capture use questionnaire base outputs patient interview . The study aim characterize patient attribute indicate one device may result great patient satisfaction another . Patient attribute compose patient characteristic ( e.g . age , sex , self efficacy , expectation treatment , perception illness ) RA characteristic ( e.g . disease severity , disease duration , prior treatment , functional impairment ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Diagnosis RA accord ACRCriteria . Eligible treatment etanercept accord Summary Product Characteristics ( SmPC ) , applicable local guideline . Willing able selfinject etanercept . Exclusion : Prior experience biologics antiTNF treatment RA include etanercept . Sepsis risk sepsis . Current recent infection , include chronic localize .
